quests.name: Through the Fringe of Madness
quests.description: Get past the Gates of Madness.

quests.name: Baiting the Trap
quests.description: Decide the fate of some greedy new adventurers in the Isles.

quests.name: Understanding Madness
quests.description: Meet the Duke of Mania and the Duchess of Dementia and join their courts.

quests.name: Addiction
quests.description: Return the Chalice of Reversal to Thadon, the Duke of Mania.

quests.name: The Lady of Paranoia
quests.description: Investigate who wants Lady Syl, the Duchess of Dementia, assassinated.

quests.name: The Cold Flame of Agnon
quests.description: Choose sides in the battle at Cylarne to relight the hope of New Sheoth.

quests.name: Ritual of Accession
quests.description: Become a Duke/Duchess in the Court of Madness.

quests.name: Ritual of Mania
quests.description: Kill the Duke of Mania and take his place.

quests.name: Ritual of Dementia
quests.description: Kill the Duchess of Dementia and take her place.

quests.name: Retaking The Fringe
quests.description: Defend the Fringe and stop the attackers.

quests.name: Rebuilding the Gatekeeper
quests.description: Find all of the parts of the Gatekeeper and rebuild it.

quests.name: The Helpless Army
quests.description: Save the Mazken/Aureal from the Knights of Order.

quests.name: Symbols of Office
quests.description: Procure the two items needed to craft the Staff of Sheogorath.

quests.name: The End of Order
quests.description: Fight the last battle against the forces of order and Jyggalag.

quests.name: The Prince of Madness
quests.description: End the Greymarch; get your rewards.
